definition: Desto is a comparative adverb that is commonly used to express a relationship of proportionality or correlation between two elements or actions. It is often employed to indicate that the more one thing or action occurs, the more another thing or action will occur as a result.

examples.german: Desto höher der Berg, desto kälter ist es.
examples.english: The higher the mountain, the colder it is.

examples.german: Desto mehr du übst, desto besser wirst du.
examples.english: The more you practice, the better you will get.

examples.german: Desto länger du wartest, desto schwieriger wird es.
examples.english: The longer you wait, the harder it will get.

examples.german: Desto größer das Risiko, desto höher die Belohnung.
examples.english: The greater the risk, the higher the reward.

examples.german: Desto früher du kommst, desto besser.
examples.english: The earlier you come, the better.
